title: Atom structure - mass of Ne-20 atom

content.question: The nucleus of a certain neutral atom is described by the notation <math alttext="N e with mass number 20 and atomic number 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mmultiscripts><mtext>Ne</mtext><mprescripts></mprescripts><mn>10</mn><mn>20</mn></mmultiscripts></math>. The mass of the entire atom is most nearly

choices.label: <math alttext="9.1 times 10 raised to the negative 30 power kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math>

<math alttext="1.8 times 10 raised to the negative 29 power kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>29</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math>

<math alttext="1.7 times 10 raised to the negative 26 power kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>26</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math>

<math alttext="3.3 times 10 raised to the negative 26 power kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>26</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3.3 times 10 raised to the negative 26 power kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>26</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math>

topic.text: 15.2: The Bohr Model of Atomic Structure

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
